enumDescriptions.ACInput: An AC electrical input or input-related circuit.
enumDescriptions.ACMaintenanceBypassInput: An AC electrical maintenance bypass input.
enumDescriptions.ACOutput: An AC electrical output or output-related circuit.
enumDescriptions.ACStaticBypassInput: An AC electrical static bypass input.
enumDescriptions.ASIC: An ASIC device, such as a networking chip or chipset component.
enumDescriptions.CoolingSubsystem: The entire cooling, or air and liquid, subsystem.
enumDescriptions.Exhaust: The air exhaust point or points or region of the chassis.
enumDescriptions.Intake: The air intake point or points or region of the chassis.
enumDescriptions.LiquidInlet: The liquid inlet point of the chassis.
enumDescriptions.LiquidOutlet: The liquid outlet point of the chassis.
enumDescriptions.Lower: The lower portion of the chassis.
enumDescriptions.Manager: A management controller, such as a BMC (baseboard management controller).
enumDescriptions.Upper: The upper portion of the chassis.

enumLongDescriptions.ACOutput: This value shall indicate an electrical output or an output-related circuit, such as a branch output, which is not terminated as a power outlet.
enumLongDescriptions.ACUtilityInput: This value shall indicate an electrical input, where the source is an electrical utility as opposed to a backup or locally-generated power source.  This value is intended to differentiate multiple electrical inputs between utility, maintenance bypass, or static bypass values.  For general purpose usage, the value of `ACInput` is preferred.
enumLongDescriptions.Board: This value shall indicate a circuit board that is not the primary or system board within a context that cannot be described by other defined values.
enumLongDescriptions.ExpansionBay: This value shall indicate a location that provides for the expansion of functionality of a system, such as a PCIe slot that can accept an option card.
enumLongDescriptions.ExpansionSubsystem: This value shall indicate a group of expansion bays and the devices installed in those bays.
enumLongDescriptions.NetworkBay: This value shall indicate a location that provides for the expansion of networking functionality of a system, by the addition of networking devices.
enumLongDescriptions.PowerOutlet: This value shall indicate an electrical outlet or receptacle.
enumLongDescriptions.PowerSupplyBay: This value shall indicate a location that provides for the installation of a power supply or similar devices.
enumLongDescriptions.StorageBay: This value shall indicate a location that provides for the expansion of storage functionality of a system, by the addition of storage devices.
enumLongDescriptions.StorageSubsystem: This value shall indicate a storage subsystem, which may consist of one or more storage controllers, storage devices, or related components.
enumLongDescriptions.Transceiver: This value shall indicate a transceiver attached to a device.

title: #PhysicalContext
